name: Journey to space
short_description:
A simple game about traveling through space to save a king, where the player controls a shuttle that travels the solar system, gathering special material from each planet as a special resource to empower a very powerful secret weapon.

The game is intended for children, as on each planet, the player will meet up with the inhabitants of the planets, be asked scientific questions about the solar system, and if he succeeded, the player will be given the material needed, to be able to answer probably, the player will be instructed on his travel to each planet.

Game engine used panda 3d
we are at the very initial phase so we will clarify more later on
summary: travel through space to save your king, python, panda 3d
